tiles.title: CommandHistory - This event includes the full command history associated with one of the consoles in a process that has recently terminated (identified by the TargetProcessId ). Note that a given UPID may be associated with multiple consoles (identified by ApplicationName ).
Scheduled Task Events - This event is sent when Falcon detects that a scheduled task has been added to the machine, either locally or remotely.
VBScripts Observed - event_simpleName  == 'ProcessRollup2' and CommandLine contains '.vbs'
tiles.description: WSCRIPT.EXE and CSCRIPT.EXE are almost exactly identical, except that one is flagged as a windows application and the other is flagged as a console application.

tiles.title: Driver Events for Host - Looks for events containing '.sys'
MacroContentInfo - Provides information about a macro extracted when an Office file is written or opened
InstalledApplications - An event that describes a single application. E.g. representing a newly installed application, one just removed, or one discovered during enumeration.
tiles.description:
Hash not in this event type... 

    AppIs64Bit,
    SHA256HashData, 
    SHA1HashData,
    MD5HashData,
    tostring(record)

tiles.title: Agent Online - This event is generated when any of these occur:1. A host is turned on or rebooted   2. A new sensor is installed on a host   3. An existing sensor is updated
Downloads Directory - Looks for files in a User's Downloads Directory (Windows)
SensorHeartbeat - Sent periodically to inform the cloud that the sensor is active.
LFODownloadConfirmation - Thrown when the agent receives an LFODownload event. (channel download)

tiles.title: DNS Request Logs Containing Artifact Token

USB Events - An event that describes a connected USB device to which Device Control is attached. It is sent each time the system powers on, the associated hub/port ispower cycled, or the device is physically inserted into the system.

tiles.markdownText:
For best performance, adjust the time range down to smaller increments e.g 2-6 hour chunks rather than 'last 24 hours'. Consider also narrowing search down to specific events by selecting specific event names. 
* Artifact search box can be left as is or can be populated

tiles.title: New tile

tiles.title: Leverages Agent Online Events - This event is generated when any of these occur:1. A host is turned on or rebooted   2. A new sensor is installed on a host   3. An existing sensor is updated
FsVolumeMounted Events - Provides information about a mounted volume.

tiles.markdownText:
For best performance, adjust the time range down to smaller increments e.g 2-6 hour chunks rather than 'last 24 hours'. 
Hostname MUST be populated. Artifact is optional.

tiles.title: New tile
tiles.markdownText: This event is generated when the sensor generates an indicator. An indicator is like a detection event ( AssociateTreeIdWithRoot ) except that it is not necessarily malicious, either because it is just an indicator (e.g. when a process opens the Recycle Bin) or because CrowdStrike is not yet confident enough inthe indicator to trigger it as a detection. Note that a detection, unlike an indicator, establishes a detection tree ( AssociateTreeIdWithRoot ) which causes thesensor to send additional information for that process tree for analysis/hunting purposes. An indicator is just a single event that has no other sensor impact.

tiles.title: Downloads Directory - Looks for files in a User's Downloads Directory (Macintosh)

parameters.displayName: Event Name (must insert a hostname for this to populate)

queries.text:
CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName has_any (event_simpleName_t)
| where * contains (artifact_t) 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    ImageFileName,
    TargetFileName,
    ParentBaseFileName,
    GrandParentBaseFileName,
    QuarantinedFileName,
    CommandLine,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName == "AsepValueUpdate" or event_simpleName contains "Reg"
| where event_simpleName != "ScheduledTaskRegistered"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    UserName,
    CommandLine,
    event_simpleName,
    RegObjectName,
    RegValueName,
    RegStringValue,
    TargetFileName,
    ImageFileName,
    FileName,
    DiskParentDeviceInstanceId

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName == (host_t) and event_simpleName == "CommandHistory" 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    UserName,
    TargetProcessId,
    ComputerName,
    CommandHistory_split =  split(CommandHistory, "Â¶"),
    CommandCount

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where ExternalApiType  == 'Event_DetectionSummaryEvent' | where TimeGenerated between (_startTime.._endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| project TimeGenerated, ComputerName,UserName, DetectDescription,PatternDispositionDescription, PatternDispositionFlags, Objective,Tactic,Technique,  FileName, CommandLine, ParentImageFileName, ParentCommandLine, GrandparentImageFileName,GrandparentCommandLine, QuarantinedFileName,  SHA256HashData, FalconHostLink, record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime.._endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName has  "ScheduledTask"//cannot do startswith as some events are RemediationActionScheduledTaskRemoval
| project TimeGenerated,ComputerName,event_simpleName,TaskName, TaskExecArguments, TaskExecCommand,  TaskXml, UserName

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'ProcessRollup2' and CommandLine contains '.vbs'
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    UserName,
    ComputerName,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    ImageFileName,
    ParentBaseFileName,
    CommandLine,
    SHA256HashData

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName startswith "Script"
    or event_simpleName == "CommandHistory"
    or event_simpleName == "NewScriptWritten"
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where not (ScriptContentName has_any ("_PSScriptPolicyTest", "ZSATunnel", "settings.dat", "LoginScript-v3.vbs", "SetDefaultPrinter.vbs", "ParseLogUA.vbs", "Setup.vbs", "RAmapdrives-v2.vbs", "Delete-IECache-v2.1.vbs", "F12Disable.vbs", "brdnssuffix.vbs", "Uninstall.vbs"))
| where not (CommandLine has_any ("Nexthink\\RemoteActions")) 
| where FileName !contains ("PSScriptPolicyTest")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    ScriptContentName,
    Process=FileName,
    ScriptContent,
    CommandLine,
    CommandHistory,
    record,
    event_simpleName

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)  
| where event_simpleName == 'DnsRequest'
| where DomainName has (artifact_t)
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| project
    dns_event=event_simpleName,
    DomainName,
    ContextProcessId,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    dnsrequest_time=TimeGenerated,
    TargetProcessId=ContextProcessId, 
    record
| join
    (
    CrowdStrikeFDR
    | where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)  
    | where event_simpleName == 'ProcessRollup2' and ComputerName contains (host_t)
    | project
        processrollup_event=event_simpleName,
        processrollup_time=TimeGenerated,
        TargetProcessId,
        SourceProcessId,
        CommandLine,
        ImageFileName,
        record
    )
    on TargetProcessId
| project
    dnsrequest_time,
    processrollup_time,
    TargetProcessId,
    CommandLine,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    ImageFileName,
    DomainName,
    record,
dns_event,
processrollup_event
//| summarize count() by ContextBaseFileName, tostring(DomainName)

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where * contains '.sys'
| where event_simpleName != 'LFODownloadConfirmation' //when a new channel data file has been downloaded.
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName, 
    ['Event-FileName']=strcat(event_simpleName, " - ", FileName),
    FileName,
    ImageFileName,
    SHA256HashData,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName == "MacroContentInfo"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    CommandLine,
    ScriptContent,
    FileName,
    ImageFileName,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == "InstalledApplication"
| summarize
    by
    event_platform,
    ComputerName,
    event_simpleName,
    AppName,
    AppPath,
    AppVendor,
    AppVersion,
    tostring(AppProductId),
    AppIs64Bit,
    SHA256HashData
| extend AppIs64Bit = case(AppIs64Bit == "0", "No", AppIs64Bit == "1", "Yes", AppIs64Bit) 
| project
    AppName,
    AppVersion,
    AppVendor,
    ComputerName,
    SHA256HashData,
    AppProductId,
    AppIs64Bit,
    event_simpleName
| sort by AppVendor asc

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'AgentOnline'
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    AgentLocalTime,
    event_simpleName,
    ComputerName,
    OU,
    SensorGroupingTags,
    MoboManufacturer,
    MoboProductName
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)  and event_platform == 'Win'
| where TargetFileName matches regex '\\\\Device\\\\HarddiskVolume\\d\\\\Users\\\\\\w+\\\\Downloads\\\\'
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    TargetFileName,
    ContextImageFileName,
    OriginalFilename,
    User,
    ComputerName,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName == "AsepValueUpdate" or event_simpleName contains "Reg" 
| where RegObjectName has_any  (
    "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run",
    "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce",
    "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnceEx",
    "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\Explorer\\Run",
    "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Shell")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    UserName,
    CommandLine,
    event_simpleName,
    RegObjectName,
    RegValueName,
    RegStringValue,
    TargetFileName,
    ImageFileName,
    FileName,
    DiskParentDeviceInstanceId

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName has_any (event_simpleName_t)
| where * contains (artifact_t)
| summarize logs = make_set(record, 20) by event_simpleName //to prevent overloading browser only retrieve 20 sample records per event type

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'SensorHeartbeat'
| project TimeGenerated, event_simpleName, ComputerName, record
| sort by TimeGenerated asc

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where ComputerName == (host_t)
    and TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName == 'LFODownloadConfirmation' 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    MachineDomain,
    CompletionEventId,
    DownloadPath,
    DownloadPort,
    DownloadServer,
    FileName,
    TargetFileName,
    record
| sort by TimeGenerated

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where (ComputerName == (host_t) or ClientComputerName == (host_t)) and TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName == 'AdditionalHostInfo'
    or event_simpleName == 'AgentOnline'
    or event_simpleName == 'UserLogon'
| project
    ComputerName,
    event_platform,
    MachineDn,
    UserName,
    SensorGroupingTags,
    MachineDomain,
    SystemProductName,
    BiosManufacturer,
    event_simpleName,
    aid,
    cid,
    OU
| where UserName !hasprefix "$"
//| where isnotempty(UserName) 
| where not  (UserName has_any ("jsupport", "LOCAL SERVICE","ejtvmp","DWM","UMFD"))
//| where isnotempty(SystemProductName)
| summarize  make_set(event_platform), make_set(MachineDn), make_set(UserName), make_set(SensorGroupingTags), make_set(SystemProductName) , 
make_set(BiosManufacturer),make_set(event_simpleName),make_set(aid),make_set(cid),make_set(OU) by ComputerName,aid, MachineDomain
 | project HostInfo=(strcat("Based on CS telemetry the host ", ComputerName," is a ", set_SystemProductName,  " and is running the", set_event_platform, " OS "
". It is in the ", set_OU, " OU and on the ", MachineDomain, " domain. ",
set_UserName, " is the user who last logged on to ", ComputerName)), 
CSHostDetails=(strcat("Host AID: ", aid, " Host CID: ", set_cid, 
". Host sensor group: ", set_SensorGroupingTags, "Host AD group: ", set_MachineDn, 
". Host BIOS Manafacturer is", set_BiosManufacturer))

database("Endpoint").CrowdStrikeFalcon
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where isnotempty(incidentDescription)
| where endpointName contains (host_t)
    or sourceEndpointHostName contains (host_t)
    or targetEndpointHostName contains (host_t)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    userName,
    sourceAccountUpn,
    sourceAccountDomain,
    incidentDescription,
    detectName,
    msg,
    severityName,
    sev,
    endpointName,
    sourceEndpointHostName,
    record,
    falconHostLink

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) and event_simpleName == 'PythonFileWritten'
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    Info=strcat(event_simpleName, " - ", FileName),
    ImageFileName,
    QuarantinedFileName,
    SHA256HashData,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)  
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'DnsRequest'
| where * contains (artifact_t)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    event_simpleName,
    DomainName,
    RespondingDnsServer,
    ContextProcessId,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    CNAMERecords,
    IP4Records,IP6Records,FirstIP4Record, FirstIP6Record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)  
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'DnsRequest'
| where * contains (artifact_t)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(DomainName)

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName has_any (event_simpleName_t)
| where * contains (artifact_t)
| project ComputerName, event_simpleName
| evaluate pivot(event_simpleName)

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime.._endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) and event_simpleName == 'InstalledBrowserExtension'
| extend
    BrowserFilePath = parse_json(record).BrowserFilePath,
    BrowserProfileName = parse_json(record).BrowserProfileName,
    BrowserExtensionVersion = parse_json(record).BrowserExtensionVersion,
    BrowserExtensionName = parse_json(record).BrowserExtensionName
| project TimeGenerated, ComputerName, BrowserFilePath,  BrowserExtensionName,BrowserExtensionVersion,BrowserProfileName
| sort by tostring(BrowserExtensionName) asc

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName == "DcUsbDeviceConnected" or event_simpleName == "DcUsbDeviceDisconnected"  
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    UserName,
    event_simpleName,
    DeviceManufacturer,
    DeviceProduct,
    DevicePropertyClassName,
    DevicePropertyDeviceDescription,
    DevicePropertyManufacturer,
    DevicePropertyFriendlyName,
    LocalAddressIP4,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName == "ProcessInjection" 
| extend
    InjecteeImageFileName = parse_json(record).InjecteeImageFileName,
    InjectorImageFileName = parse_json(record).InjectorImageFileName
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    InjecteeImageFileName,
    InjectorImageFileName,
    ModuleName,
    event_simpleName,
    ContextProcessId
| sort by tostring(InjecteeImageFileName) asc

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName startswith_cs "ActiveDirectory"
| where aid has (host_t) or SourceEndpointHostName startswith (host_t) or TargetEndpointHostName has (host_t) or ComputerName has (host_t)  or SamAccountName has (username_t) or SourceAccountUserName has (username_t)
| project TimeGenerated, SourceDC=ComputerName, SourceEndpointHostName, SourceAccountUserName, name, TargetServiceAccessIdentifier, TargetServerHostName, TargetServerAddressIP4, SamAccountName, AccountDomain, SourceAccountDomain,LdapSearchBaseObjectSample,LdapSearchFilterSample,LdapSearchFilterShape

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)  //2 searches separated by an OR. First, search looks for hostname AND artifact (optional). Second, looks for Artifact only (hostname not required)
| where (ComputerName == (host_t) and ((event_simpleName has 'NetworkConnect' or event_simpleName == 'FirewallRuleIP6Matched' or event_simpleName == 'FirewallRuleIP4Matched' or event_simpleName == 'NetworkReceiveAcceptIP4' or event_simpleName == 'NetworkReceiveAcceptIP6') and (RemoteAddressIP4 == (artifact_t) or RemoteAddressIP6 == (artifact_t)))) 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    ComputerName,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    LocalAddressIP4,
    LocalPort,
    RemoteAddressIP4,
    RemotePort,
    geo_ip4=geo_info_from_ip_address(RemoteAddressIP4),
    geo_ip6=geo_info_from_ip_address(RemoteAddressIP6),
    RemoteAddressIP6,
    LocalAddressIP6,
    tostring(Protocol),
    ConnectionDirection= parse_json(record).ConnectionDirection,
    RuleAction= parse_json(record).RuleAction,
    record
| extend
    IPProtocolType = case( 
                       Protocol == "0",
                       "IP",
                       Protocol == "21",
                       "ICMP",
                       Protocol == "6",
                       "TCP",
                       Protocol == "17",
                       "UDP",
                       Protocol == "41", 
                       "IPV6",
                       Protocol == "58",
                       "ICMPV6", 
                       Protocol == "255",
                       "UNKNOWN - Refer to CS Events Data Dictionary",
                       Protocol
                   ), 
    ConnectionDirection = case( 
                          ConnectionDirection == "0",
                          "DIRECTION_OUTBOUND",
                          ConnectionDirection == "1",
                          "DIRECTION_INBOUND",
                          ConnectionDirection == "2",
                          "DIRECTION_NEITHER",
                          ConnectionDirection == "3",
                          "DIRECTION_BOTH",
                          ConnectionDirection == "4", 
                          "DIRECTION_UNKNOWN",
                          ConnectionDirection
                      ), 
    FirewallRuleAction = case( 
                         RuleAction == "0",
                         "RULE_ACTION_INVALID",
                         RuleAction == "1",
                         "RULE_ACTION_ALLOW",
                         RuleAction == "2",
                         "RULE_ACTION_DENY",
                         RuleAction
                     ), 
    //Enrichment as of 11/18/2024. IPv4 and IPv6 Protocol have same values in Data Dictionary. 
    geo_ip = coalesce(geo_ip4, geo_ip6), 
    RemoteAddressIP = coalesce(RemoteAddressIP4, RemoteAddressIP6), 
    LocalAddressIP = coalesce(LocalAddressIP4, LocalAddressIP6)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    ComputerName,
    IPProtocolType,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    LocalPort,
    RemotePort,
    LocalAddressIP,
    RemoteAddressIP,
    ConnectionDirection,
    FirewallRuleAction,
    IP_Country=tostring(geo_ip.country),
    IP_City=tostring(geo_ip.city),
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| where event_simpleName has_any ("VolumeSnapshotDeleted", "VolumeSnapshotCreated")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    ComputerName,
    UserName,
    VolumeSnapshotName,
    VolumeName,
    TargetFileName,
    CommandLine,
    FileName,
    ImageFileName

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName startswith_cs "UserLog" and (ComputerName contains (host_t) or UserName has (username_t))
| where not (UserName has_any ("DWM", "UMFD", "jsupport", "LOCAL SERVICE", "SYSTEM", "ejtvmp")) 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    UserName,
    LogonDomain,
    LogonType = tostring(LogonType),
    ClientComputerName,
    aid,
    LogonTime,
    LogoffTime
| extend LogonType = case(
                         LogonType == "0",
                         "System",
                         LogonType == "2",
                         "Interactive",
                         LogonType == "3",
                         "Network",
                         LogonType == "4",
                         "Batch",
                         LogonType == "5",
                         "Service",
                         LogonType == "7" and event_simpleName == "UserLogon",
                         "Unlock",
                         LogonType == "7" and event_simpleName == "UserLogoff",
                         "Lock",
                         LogonType == "7" and event_simpleName == "UserLogonFailed2",
                         "Unlock Attempt",
                         LogonType == "9",
                         "NewCredentials",
                         LogonType == "10",
                         "RemoteInteractive",
                         LogonType == "11",
                         "CachedInteractive",
                         LogonType
                     )
| sort by ClientComputerName, TimeGenerated asc

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) 
| where event_simpleName == 'AgentOnline' or event_simpleName == 'FirmwareImageAnalyzed'
    or event_simpleName == 'FirmwareImageCheck' 
| project
    event_simpleName,
    ComputerName,
    SourceAccountUserName,
    AgentVersion,
    BiosVersion,
    BiosReleaseDate,
    BiosManufacturer,
    TpmManufacturer,
    SystemSku,
    MoboProductName,
    PlatformSecuritySettings,
    SystemProductName,
    SystemSerialNumber,
    TpmFirmwareVersion,
    MdmDeviceId,
    FirmwareSize,
    FirmwareType,
    ConfigBuild,
    NumberOfMeasurements,
    SHA256HashData

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName == "EmailArchiveFileWritten"
| where  ComputerName == (host_t)  or TargetFileName contains (username_t)
| project TimeGenerated,event_simpleName, ComputerName, FileName,TargetFileName, ContextBaseFileName

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName == "FsVolumeMounted"
| where  ComputerName == (host_t)  or VirtualDriveFileName contains (username_t )
| project  TimeGenerated,event_simpleName,ComputerName, User_Profile_VHDX_FileName=extract_all("(\\w+\\.VHDX)", VirtualDriveFileName),AzureNetAppDeviceName=VirtualDriveFileName, DiskParentDeviceInstanceId,VolumeFileSystemDriver, VolumeSessionUUID, VolumeMountPoint, VolumeDriveLetter
| sort by AzureNetAppDeviceName

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where event_simpleName endswith "FileWritten"
| where  ComputerName == (host_t)  or TargetFileName contains (username_t)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    UserName,
    CommandLine,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    TargetFileName,
    ContextImageFileName,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    TemporaryFileName

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName == (host_t) or UserName == (username_t)
| where event_simpleName == 'AssociateIndicator'
| project-reorder TimeGenerated,TargetProcessId,cid, ComputerName,UserName, OU, SensorGroupingTags

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName == (host_t) 
| search (Process_t)
| project-reorder
    TimeGenerated,
    ComputerName,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    ContextBaseFileName,
    ImageFileName,
    TargetFileName,
    ParentBaseFileName,
    GrandParentBaseFileName,
    QuarantinedFileName,
    CommandLine,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName == (host_t) 
| search (Process_t)
| summarize logs = make_set(record) by event_simpleName

CrowdStrikeFDR 
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where ComputerName contains (host_t) and event_platform == 'Mac'
| where TargetFileName matches regex '/Users/\\w+/Downloads/'
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    event_simpleName,
    FileName,
    TargetFileName,
    ContextImageFileName,
    OriginalFilename,
    User,
    ComputerName,
    record

CrowdStrikeFDR
| where TimeGenerated between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where ComputerName contains (host_t)
| extend event_simpleName = tostring(parse_json(record).event_simpleName)
| summarize by event_simpleName
| sort by event_simpleName asc
